title: Shorts: a take on poetry
description: Shorts - a take on poetry is the first collection of poems by Eric Daniel Clarke – a reflection on life, on human relationships, on chances taken and those missed.Written in a spontaneous, sparse, free-form style, disciplined by a trained sub-conscious mind, this generous collection of deceptively simple yet inventive poetry invites contemplation, interpretation and gives rise to smiles.Eric Daniel Clarke, an Englishman, a scientist, a life spent working at the interface of the physical and life sciences, now using words in place of molecules to explore life’s boundaries, imagined, real, of his mind, and yours.
author: Eric Daniel Clarke
